user.title: Authenticate with Aira Cloud
user.description:
Enter your **Aira account credentials** to list your available devices. This is required since the account stores an important key needed to write data to the device over BLE.
_Your credentials are only used to fetch this key and are not stored_

select_device.title: Select Your Device
select_device.description:
Found **{device_count} device(s)** in your Aira account. Select the device you want to add.
If your device is not listed, ensure it is registered in your Aira account. (Heat pumps are the only supported device type for now)

configure.title: Configure Device Settings
configure.description:
Set how often data should be fetched from your device. Default is **{default_interval} seconds**. Lower values provide more frequent updates but may cause more errors.
Adjust the **number of zones** and **number of phases** if the detected one is incorrect.

init.title: Configure Device
init.description:
Update the settings for your Aira Device.
Adjust the **update interval** to change how often data is fetched from your device. Lower values provide more frequent updates but may cause more errors.
Modify the **number of zones** and **number of phases** if the detected one is incorrect.

invalid_temperature.message: Temperature must be one of: {allowed_temperatures}°C. Received: {temperature}°C. Use + / - button if unsure.

scheduler_active.message: Cannot set temperature while scheduler is active. Please disable the scheduler first.
